title: What nontoxic thing will you mute?
body:
There are two things in this game that I mute immediately.

"ff at 20" in the first 5 minutes and "I am high"
I already know nothing you say from this point on will be useful so you are muted. Anyone else have any instant mute phrases?

replies.body:
http://i.imgur.com/N0vtDwb.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/ZFtvUIu.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/T3buoBk.jpg

The second one is ironic for me. Because that'd be a mutin' for me, according to most, but my name is actually a historical reference. I'm a history buff who happens to have incorporated Japanese history into his username, and I get called a weeaboo for it. Maybe I should change my name to Owain Glynd≈µr...
YOU A WEEEABOO
I'm facepalming so hard right now....
Not a fan of Welsh history? Maybe "Hardeknud" then? Or I could look southward and go with "Gaius Marius"...
I have asked a Zac why they had clarity before, but that seems like more of a legitimate question than a reason for muting
Perhaps he thought his gel was too opaque.

I have several. Mentioning "high" is one of mine, too! Here are several others:

* "<unorthodox pick> <role> gg"
* "I gotta take a ****"
* "I'm gonna **** all over this <champion>"
* "so are u a girl?"
* "Weeb", "weeaboo" and "fkin jap" are all instant mutes.
* "like I <pun> your mom last night"
* "autistic"
* "downsyndrome" (Seriously, at least look up the actual name of the syndrome before you use it as an insult...)
* "retard"
* "You're not good", "get good", "good job noob", "you wish you were this good", and anything with "good" in it that isn't "good job!" are mutes. Technical toxicity tho.
* "gay/faggot" not because of social justice, but because it implies the typist is < 20 and will have nothing productive to say.
* "I'M SO RAW"
* "r u drunk?"
* "i'm so drunk"
* Any mention of LCS usually does it.
* Any mention of rank will usually do it if prefaced by arrogant speech.
* "what rank/lv are you?" will do it regardless.
* "come 1v1"
* "STOP FEEDING", because seriously, if they're not doing it on purpose I'm pretty sure they'd have stopped already if they could.
* Mentions of anyone's score. Especially when someone calls me out for being 0/6 as a support when I have 11 assists and my ADC has no deaths.
* Just CHOOSING Battle Bunny Riven is a mute.
* "what is your build even??" / "read a guide"
* Mentions of sexual acts against other players will do it. Hell, mentions of genitalia will do it. Interesting how many people will use "gay" as in insult and then talk about all the things they're gonna do to the guy across the lane.
* "GANK", because when I jungle, I tend to get pressured into being gank-happy really easily. If I don't mute these people, I literally never farm.
* Mentions of a fedora are mutes, largely because they don't even realize they're talking about trilbies and I'm a language pedant. Also because I dislike hats.
* Any name featuring some juvenile facet is a mute.
* "i'm <rank>, this is my smurf"
* "kid" usually does it. I'm not fond of being called a kid by people 4-8 years my junior, and if they're talking to someone else they're still implying they're like to be jerks the entire game.
* Mentions of someone's IRL name, because it tells me they're gonna do a lot of talking that doesn't pertain to the rest of the team and will muck up the chat.

To name a few. :)
I agree with all of these... except Battle Bunny Riven. Y u hate on the bunny?

.... Well, that and it doesn't fit her character. If a skin is gonna go alternate universe, I like it to either be thematically suitable (Not Really Udyr) or somehow fit the character's established personality (Pool Party Leona).

I just never felt like the design on Battle Bunny Riven _said_ "Riven", and unless I missed a meme, the bunny theme feels like it came out of left field.

It was a community requested skin. One of the old GD celeb trolls mentioned how Riven "hopped" around so much (because of Q) that she should get a bunny girl skin. Add a bunch of fan art and a few thousand up votes later and Riot eventually jumped on board with the idea and released the battle bunny skin.
Aha, now I see! I still don't like the skin for other personal peeve reasons, but now I understand the premise at least. :)

Every Battle Bunny Riven I've seen has flamed no matter what the circumstances are.  I have honestly never seen one that was a decent person or even one that was simply quiet in chat.  

Some examples of what I've seen...  
**If they beat their opponent in lane**:  'Git gud, noob.' or worse (usually much worse).  
**If they lose lane**:  'Wtf, this guy's hacking.' all game long or 'Omfg jungler, ^^^^ing gank, you useless ^^^^.' etc. 
**If someone on their team feeds**:  'Omfg you ^^^^ing useless ^^^^.'   /All 'Report this ^^^^ing noob <champion>.'  etc.  

I know this may not be the case for every Riven with that skin, but if you exist, you precious, precious creatures, please never be like the ones I've seen.  Please, stay innocent and kind for as long as you live.  Thank you.  :D

Honestly, I don't really care about what a skin has to do with the character. My personal favorite skin is Arcade Hecarim, and what the heck do those have in common? I see what you're talking about, and I get why you mute them. As you said, it's just personal preference.
Personal preference. I hate bowties. :D

> [{quoted}](name=musounotakamaru,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=oX3dqLPi,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-05-18T20:46:45.359+0000)

> * Mentions of sexual acts against other players will do it. Hell, mentions of genitalia will do it. Interesting how many people will use "gay" as in insult and then talk about all the things they're gonna do to the guy across the lane.

Your user would constitute instant mute for me. Refer to "weeb".

Funny, that! Because I now refer you to this post!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/oX3dqLPi-what-nontoxic-thing-will-you-mute?comment=00040000

(Somehow, I anticipated your reaction.)

> Mentions of someone's IRL name, because it tells me they're gonna do a lot of talking that doesn't pertain to the rest of the team and will muck up the chat.

THANK YOU!
Often times my friends and I play on skype, but I can't use a mic (either it's broken, or theres someone sleeping in the same room, or SOMETHING) and I feel really bad for all the out of context things I type to respond to them.
So you won't mute me if I say "git gud", because I spelt it "gud" not "good"? :^)
Oh-ho, sneaky sneaky! :D
Call me "Butt Assassin" for I'm sneakily going for ~~Uranus~~ your ignore list ( Õ°¬∞ Õú ñ Õ°¬∞)
LOL. Puns of Damage spotted!
I have {{champion:268}}ion more of them.
ALL THE PUNS. I'M {{champion:131}} LAUGHTER HERE.

{{champion:122}} Tell me about it.


lolwtf
Once I added this comment that's what appeared on my screen. It was gone after I reloaded the page.
http://i.imgur.com/hcFzYY9.png

The best part? How fucking well my comment blends into that bugged text xD

"..."
"I wish I got a gank."
"Jungler still farming."
Anyone who says "Rekt".
What if they are using Rek'Sai, and they say Rek't?

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=oX3dqLPi,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2015-05-19T15:16:40.023+0000)
>
> What if they are using Rek'Sai, and they say Rek't?

The pun is still awful.
"Outplayed" or anything of that nature.
Basically anything that starts with "why" like "why did you" or "why are you". Seriously, there's no correct answer to these questions. No matter what you say, they are going to argue.

"I got to go surrender so I don't get leaverbusted."
"takes 5 to kill me"
Anybody that has the word "Boy" in their name.
I mute anyone who trash talks in ALL unless they are being humorous or friendly about it.

But the trash talk can be so entertaining. Like "you suck because you play a no skill champ" says the 0-8 mid laner. Or the top laner that makes fun of you for needing ganks to kill him and then whines that the rest of his team sucks when they lose the game.

"LULLLZ TEH BARRELZZZZZ AAAAAAH BARRELZZ HAHAHAHAHAHA"

My plan worked. Because of my username, I can identify and promptly mute any PewDiePie fan I run into.

I've never watched him, but I know way more than I want to. As a result, this amuses me to no end. :) I commend your cunning, as well as your hatred of that foul cretin and his gaggle of baseborn curs!
I don't get it. Then again I have never watched a single video by him.
He hates barrels. That's his running gag. It's as lame as it sounds.
If you make puns I will mute you. Don't think I won't.

Do I smell a bait?

I feel like if you really don't want to hear puns, making a post like this will {{champion:222}} you!

i have an auto mute mecanism, it mute and report if you say :

viegar
rito
report
noob
Rito, pl0x, report dis viegar noob.
Everybody who sends more than 3 messages within 10 seconds.
Oh, damn. That might be me. I type VERY fast. :| Though three full sentences in ten seconds might be pushing my speed.

"omg ks"

Or sometimes I don't mute and KS on purpose just to piss him off.

The problem here is I got reported for stuff similar to this ("please stop feeding"  for example)

and I got chat and ranked restricted for it :c
Jet fuel can't melt steel beams.
"It's just a game."
